import React from "react"; import "./PunishmentResponse.css"; export default class ContributionsDisplay extends React.Component { render() { const { game, round, player } = this.props; const totalContributions = round.get("totalContributions"); const contribution = player.round.get("contribution"); const multiplier = game.treatment.multiplier; const totalReturns = round.get("totalReturns"); const payoff = round.get("payoff"); return (

You contributed
{contribution}
Others contributed
+{totalContributions - contribution}
Total Contributions
{totalContributions}
Total Returns
Total Contributions
{totalContributions}
Multiplier
+{multiplier}
Total returns (Total Contributions x multiplier)
{totalReturns}
Your Returns
Total returns
{totalContributions}
All players
/{game.treatment.playerCount}
Your returns
{payoff}
); } }
